text: Brocchinia pustulosa is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Cancellariidae, the nutmeg snails. ==Description== ==Distribution== This marine species occurs off Southeast Brazil. ==References== * Verhecken, A., 1991. Description of two new species of bathyal Cancellariidae (Mollusca, Gastropoda) from off Brazil. Bulletin du Muséum national d'Histoire naturelle 12(3-4)("1990"): 547-553 ==External links== * MNHN, Paris: holotype Category:Cancellariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1991
title: Brocchinia pustulosa
